title: Add priority field to student pipeline

implementation.summary: Add a priority select field (High/Medium/Low) to the student pipeline configuration to enable better lead management.

steps.location: createAjnabiPipelines() â†’ students pipeline fields array
steps.description:
Add a new FieldDefinition object with:
  - id: 'priority'
  - name: 'priority'
  - type: 'select'
  - label: 'Priority'
  - required: false
  - options: ['High', 'Medium', 'Low']
  - showInKanban: true
  - showInTable: true
Confirm FieldType union includes 'select'. If not present, add it.
Verify EntityForm correctly renders a select dropdown for the new priority field based on the pipeline config.

criteria: Field value is saved with entity

research.summary: CRM systems typically use 3-5 priority levels. High/Medium/Low is most common and user-friendly.
sources: Perplexity research on CRM priority field best practices

notes: This is a straightforward pipeline field addition following the established pattern in the codebase.
